attributes.action: Censure Tony Blair for undermining the UK negotiation position with the EU.
attributes.background: The former prime minister Tony Blair is an opponent of the UK leaving the EU, he is entitled to his opinion and to express it publicly. However working with foreign powers to thwart the efforts of the current government to implement the result of a referendum is unacceptable behaviour.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government isn't responsible for censuring individuals for their actions.
